participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Curious and whimsical, often lost in thought and imaginative.
participant_1.background: I believe i hear voices. I am lusting after the neighbour pool boy. I enjoy mystery flavour cake. I collect toys wearing little rain coats.

participant_2.name: Mia
participant_2.personality: Friendly and imaginative, with a strong sense of loyalty and a bit of a dreamer.
participant_2.background: My mom is my best friend. I love iced tea. I have four sisters. I am terrified of heights. I believe that mermaids are real.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
It's nice to meet you, participant_1. What do you like to do for fun?
I love iced tea, I have four sisters, I'm terrified of heights and I believe that mermaids are real.
That's interesting! I've never met anyone who believes in mermaids before.
I know, it's not very common. But I've always believed in them, ever since I was a little girl.
Do you have any proof that they exist?
No, not really. But I've seen them in my dreams, and I just know that they're out there.
Well, I'm not going to tell you that you're wrong, because I've never seen a mermaid myself. But I'm also not going to tell you that you're right, because I have no proof that they exist either.
That's fair enough. I'm just glad that there are other people who believe in them too.
Me too. It's nice to know that I'm not the only one who thinks they're real.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to collect toys wearing little rain coats.
That's a very interesting hobby. Do you have any favorites?
I have a few favorites. I have a little duck wearing a rain coat, and a little dog wearing a rain coat.
Those sound adorable! I'd love to see them sometime.
I'd be happy to show you.
Great! I'm free right now, if you want to show me.
